definition[0]: to reduce the amount, size, cost etc of something
example[0]: Several major hospitals are cutting back on staff at the moment.
example[1]: Education spending cannot be cut back any further.
example[2]: Richer countries must do more to cut back carbon emissions.
definition[1]: to remove the top part of a plant in order to help it to grow
example[3]: Cut back the shoots in spring to encourage bushier growth.
definition[2]: to eat, drink, or use less of something, especially in order to improve your health
example[4]: Try to cut back on foods containing wheat and dairy products.
